title: event
description: Document to record a quanta of collected data

descriptor.description: UID of the EventDescriptor to which this Event belongs

filled.description: Mapping each of the keys of externally-stored data to the boolean False, indicating that the data has not been loaded, or to foreign keys (moved here from 'data' when the data was loaded)

seq_num.description: Sequence number to identify the location of this Event in the Event stream

time.description: The event time. This maybe different than the timestamps on each of the data entries.

timestamps.description: The timestamps of the individual measurement data

uid.description: Globally unique identifier for this Event
